content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position(x=-10.0 y=-49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=-10.0 y=-49.0)
-  Inserter at position(x=-16.5 y=-46.5)

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when using inserter but having no source items
  - Ensure the inserter has source items before attempting to insert
* Errors when using furnace but having no iron ore
  - Ensure there is iron ore in the furnace before attempting to smelt
* Errors when using furnace but having no coal in inventory
  - Ensure there is coal in the inventory before attempting to insert into furnace

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
